title: Jimmy Kimmel Hilariously Spoofs Valentine’s Day Cards Going Around the White House | 22 Words
text:
Over 3 million people just like you 'Like' us » Like it? Share it! 168 Shares 
President Trump's Valentine's Day plans probably include dinner and dancing with a mirror, but how does the rest of his staff show their affection on this day when love is in the air? 
Jimmy Kimmel answered that question by creating fake "White House Valentine's" from all of your favorite administration members to help you feel the love — as long as you're not an immigrant, of course. Dr. Ben Carson
